Wondrous item, legendary (requires attunement)
This black cloak appears to be made of pure shadow and shrouds you in darkness. While wearing it, you gain the following benefits:

  • You have advantage on Dexterity (Stealth) checks.
  • You have resistance to necrotic damage.
  • You can cast the @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells.Item.S7VbUetIfVT7B6Eq]{darkness} and @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells.Item.wqfAVANuQonNBgnL]{misty step} spells from it at will. Casting either spell from the cloak requires an action. Instead of a silvery mist when you cast @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells.Item.wqfAVANuQonNBgnL]{misty step}, you are engulfed in the darkness of the cloak and emerge from the cloak’s darkness at your destination.
  • You can use an action to cast the @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells.Item.DGONTFbk5eORs5qv]{black tentacles} or @UUID[Compendium.koboldpressogl.koboldpressspells.Item.KPlivingshadows0]{living shadows} spell from it. The cloak can’t be used this way again until the following dusk.
